title: New skin - Xerath iron man

embed.description: Xerath skin idea character sheet : db.thaianime.net/images/exaxux… Ironman Xerath

body:
Hello!

I play League of legends very often. I just LOVE to play xerath. At this time, my favourite skin is scorched earth Xerath. But I would realy love to see a new skin for this champion like Iron man skin. Would it be possible to make it? Champ skills are perfect to go with the skin. 

Q - he shoots from the hand (beam of power)
W - An attack from middle of his cheast 
E - shoots from his hand (ball of power)
R - stretch out his hand and shoots mini rockets that land on the point where you aim.

(When he has 425 or more speed, he would put his hands like iron man and float/fly ower the surface) - Amaizing, amaizing, amaizing!!!

I don't see why would it be so hard to make it. Every one would love to buy this skin :D

replies.body: That could be an amazing Legendary Skin, but like Best Kog NA said, copyright exists. Then again, Forsaken Jayce and Chosen Master Yi are based off the Star Wars franchise, so who knows.
Also the new skins on the P.B.E for Draven, Sejuani and Tryndamere are a based off of Monster Hunter. makes me sad I can only afford to get one skin at the moment :(
Zinogre sejuani is the best one

I think the workaround is to have the main themes of these skins heavily influenced by the source material without actually copying. It sucks that copyrights are very strict and abusable, but at the same time it keeps the jackholes from basically just stealing other peoples work.

I want to see this too however.

1. Well about copyright. Riot has a lot of money. I guess it would not be a problem to pay and get permission to make the skin (they would get money back from players who would buy this skin).

2. I think that Marvel would be glad to promote Iron man in a well-known game. So if Riot would want to try, I'm highly positive that they would succeed at getting permission :)

Pretty sure it's not just about getting permission but about how much effort it is and how it would change expectations within the community. Unlikely that this or any other copyrighted material will be made into a skin. :/
Well than, let dreams be dreams I guess...
